```Java

public class Main {

	//반환형, 함수명, 매개변수
	public static int function(int a,int b, int c) {
		int min=a;
		int max=b;
		int r=1;
		if(min>b) {
			min=b;
			if(min>c)min=c;
		}
		if(max<b) {
			max=b;
			if(max<a)max=a;
		}
		for(int i=2;i<=min;i++) {
			if(a%i==0 && b%i==0 && c%i==0) {
				r=i;
				System.out.println("최대공약수 변경: "+r);
			}
		}
		return r;
	}
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int r=0;
		r=function(12,16,20);
		System.out.println("최대공약수 = "+r+" 입니다.");
	}

}

```
